pageProduct.name: Avene Eau Thermale Spring Water 300ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Avène Thermal Spring Water 300mL.

Warnings

Formulated to minimize the risks of allergy. Non comedogenic.

Common Uses

Avène Thermal Spring Water is soothing, anti-irritating and softening. Pure Thermal Spring Water with nitrogen gas. No preservatives. pH 7.5. Low mineral content.

Ingredients

AVENE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA) GAS : Nitrogen

Directions

Apply a fine mist all over the face after cleansing with the cleanser of your choice. Let it work for 2 minutes and gently pat dry with a face towel or a tissue. Follow with your daily moisturizer. Can be used on irritated, damaged skin, after minor laser treatments, radiotherapy and burns to soothe, soften and reduce the irritation and the redness. To set your make-up, apply a fine mist all over the face once your make-up is done and let it dry.
